ygData.subject: Re: Lets find Bidl Frugin
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t think you have any idea what you re talking about.
ygData.messageBody:
I don't think you have any idea what you're talking about.

>All the lenses are for the observer Staff. For sure. That is not an
>issue. I have seen people complete this quest in akanon so it can be
>done.
> There is a whole guild on the Povar server Named the Harmonium that
>have
>these staffs from accomplishing the four lenses quest. granted You can
>also get the staff off the borxx evil eye by obtaining his lense. But I
>have seen high level characters in the mino caves in steam font get the
>lense
>from the slave in there. They do it regularly to keep their lower level
>guildies equipped.
